};const closeProjectModal=()=>{setIsModalOpen(false);setSelectedProject(null);document.body.style.overflow='unset';// Restore scrolling

useEffect(()=>{let currentCharIndex=0;let isDeleting=false;let typingSpeed=50;// Faster typing speed

}}else{// Typing text
if(currentCharIndex<currentRole.length){setTypingText(currentRole.substring(0,currentCharIndex+1));currentCharIndex++;typingSpeed=50;// Faster typing
}else{// Finished typing, wait 2 seconds then start deleting
typingSpeed=2000;// Wait 2 seconds
isDeleting=true;}}timeoutId=setTimeout(typeText,typingSpeed);};// Start typing animation after a short delay
